details.description: Beyond its scenic overlooks, this mile-deep geologic wonder features hikes, mule rides & rafting.

activities.name: Grand Canyon Village
activities.description: A census-designated place located on the South Rim. It is wholly focused on accommodating tourists visiting the canyon.

activities.name: Bright Angel Trail
activities.description: A trail located on the South Rim of The Grand Canyon. It is 8 miles long, and changes elevation by 4,380 ft.
